lead_paragraph: Andy Benoit is the founder of NFLTouchdown.com and a writer for CBSSports.com's N.F.L. blog. He can be contacted at andy.benoit@NFLTouchdown.com.
snippet: Despite injury problems in July, the Ravens are still stacked with talent. This is the year the offense may finally surpass the defense.
abstract: Despite injury problems in July, the Ravens are still stacked with talent. This is the year the offense may finally surpass the defense.
